document_data.name: Gower
document_data.mainbody:
'''Gower''' was a male [[dwarf]] scout living in [[Waterdeep]] during the [[Time of Troubles]] in [[1358 DR]].

He was an acquaintance of [[Durnan]] and [[Khelben]] and guided them, plus [[Elminster Aumar]] and the mortal [[Kelemvor]], to a passage to the [[Fugue Plane]] located in [[Undermountain]].{{cite book/Waterdeep|331-334}}
